Please find below Airfreight & Sea freight rates, please advise us the Mode of transport & below approx. charges applicable

 

// 

Still waiting for instruction form supplier on the readiness.

 

Airfreight OPTION: 31 plt / 1046 lg / 10.035 cbm ./ non stackable cargo: AED 9375.00 approx

Transit Time: 1-2 days 

 

 

LCL  OPTION: 31 plt / 1046 lg / 10.035 cbm ./ non stackable cargo: AED 6660 approx

Transit Time: 30-35 days

 

 

 

SEAFREIGHT LCL selling

	
Ocean Freight : USD 50 per w/m (Min USD 50)

DG surcharge : USD 80 per shipment (if applicable

Ex work charges : EUR 50 per shipment 

Documentation:EUR 150 per shipment (if applicable)  

		
Jebel Ali Locals:

	
LCL handling  per shipment : AED 970 per HBL 

Prot Handling  per w/m : AED 160 per w/m (AED 250) 

Delivery charges : AED 30 w/m (Min AED 250 // Max AED 800 per Trailer per Trip)

 //

 

Regards

 

 

GEETA MANJAL​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

chunks.text:
Kindly share the final commercial invoice & packing list as per the below details requested accordingly we shall share the details our forwarder to arrange

 

//

Please share with the Final commercial invoice + packing list along with cargo details advise Mode of transport & share packed pictures of the cargo 

1.	Shipper / Collection address along with contact details / Email ID s
2.	Advise cargo readiness date 
3.	Cargo delivery instructions 
4.	Complete cargo details 
5.	Mode of Transport 
6.	Share packed pictures of the cargo before & after loading.

 

Below should be the consignee address on the commercial documents 

 



 

Ensure to include below on Invoice against each line item

*	Invoice number
*	Date
*	HS code
*	Country of Origin 
*	Unit price 
*	Value
*	Currency 
*	Terms of the shipment 

//

 

Regards

 

GEETA MANJAL​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

I do hope my mail finds you well.

 

I’d inform you that we’re ready with your order ref P.I 872; in order to organize the collection, as per agreement, I kindly ask you to proceed with the second payment__40% AT ADVISE GOODS READY .

The last 10% as Bank Transfer at 30 invoice days .

 

We remain at your disposal for any further information.

Thanks and best regards

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Laura Brenna

Export Dept.

Hi @Lali Das <mailto:Lali.Das@chalhoub.com> 

Good Morning

 

Please find below Airfreight & Sea freight rates, please advise us the Mode of transport & below approx. charges applicable

 

// 

Still waiting for instruction form supplier on the readiness.

 

Airfreight OPTION: 31 plt / 1046 lg / 10.035 cbm ./ non stackable cargo: AED 9375.00 approx

Transit Time: 1-2 days 

 

 

LCL  OPTION: 31 plt / 1046 lg / 10.035 cbm ./ non stackable cargo: AED 6660 approx

Transit Time: 30-35 days

 

 

 

SEAFREIGHT LCL selling

	
Ocean Freight : USD 50 per w/m (Min USD 50)

DG surcharge : USD 80 per shipment (if applicable

Ex work charges : EUR 50 per shipment 

Documentation:EUR 150 per shipment (if applicable)  

		
Jebel Ali Locals:

	
LCL handling  per shipment : AED 970 per HBL 

Prot Handling  per w/m : AED 160 per w/m (AED 250) 

Delivery charges : AED 30 w/m (Min AED 250 // Max AED 800 per Trailer per Trip)

 //

 

Regards

 

 

GEETA MANJAL​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Dear Geeta,

here below the preliminary info:

 

Pick-up address:

Living Divani srl

Strada del Cavolto 15/17

22040 Anzano del Parco(CO)

 

Warehouse:

Mon-Fri 8.30-12//13.30-17.30__we need to be informed on the precise day of collection
